name: Stickmad
description:
YOU NEED A XBOX CONTROLLER TO PLAY THIS GAME.

Stickmad is a school project made by 4 students in less than a months.

Play as a mad stickman and kill enemies with your spells, try to survive long enough to get the 100K points Platinium medal!

Game made by 4 game design students:

- Hugo Kihl (Graphics)

- Michel Bigourd (Game design)

- Alexandre Zandecki (Game design, level design)

- Mathieu Bouchonnet (Programmation)

Made with unity.
